queries.title: Search Queries
queries.description: List of Google-style discovery queries to find potential Instagram URLs.
default: site:instagram.com ("wholesaling" OR "wholesale real estate") ("coach" OR "mentorship" OR "apply")
site:instagram.com ("trading" OR "options") ("signals" OR "community" OR "book a call")

maxProfiles.title: Maximum Profiles
maxProfiles.description: Maximum number of profiles to process.

minFollowers.title: Minimum Followers
minFollowers.description: Minimum number of followers to qualify an account.

activeWithinDays.title: Active Within (Days)
activeWithinDays.description: Filter profiles with posts within the last X days.

requireLinkOrEmail.title: Require Link or Email
requireLinkOrEmail.description: If true, only profiles with external links or emails are qualified.
